main event: A woman named Martha Johnson observed a large, silver, round object with a golden glow around it over Long Island Sound for about 20 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed hovering and occasionally darting upwards and downwards.
The object was observed from the backyard of Mrs. Johnson's residence.
There were no other witnesses to this observation.
The case is open pending further information.
sighted object: a large, silver, round object with a golden glow
